title: No kitchen - loft space
posting_body: Very small 3rd floor apartment available for rent.
The apartment includes a living room and bonus storage space.
Lots of permitted street parking nearby.
$1,250 per month rent includes heat, hot water and electric.
First and last ($2,500) is required to move in.
Located in East Somerville, 2 minute walk to buses that will take you to every square in Cambridge.
20 minute walk to Sullivan Square Orange Line.
2 minute drive to 93, 5 minute drive to downtown Boston.
